scripts.start-auth: cd server/auth && rimraf dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=development nest start --watch
scripts.start-auth:stage: cd server/auth && npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=stage npm run start:prod
scripts.start-menu: cd server/menu && rimraf dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=development nest start --watch
scripts.start-menu:stage: cd server/menu && npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=stage npm run start:prod
scripts.start-plan: cd server/plan && rimraf dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=development nest start --watch
scripts.start-plan:stage: cd server/plan && npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=stage npm run start:prod
scripts.start-docs: cd server/docs && rimraf dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=development nest start --watch
scripts.start-docs:stage: cd server/docs && npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=stage npm run start:prod
scripts.start-file: cd server/file && rimraf dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=development nest start --watch
scripts.start-file:stage: cd server/file && npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=stage npm run start:prod
scripts.start-notification: cd server/notification && rimraf dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=development nest start --watch
scripts.start-notification:stage: cd server/notification && npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=stage npm run start:prod
scripts.install-all: concurrently "cd client && npm install" "cd server/auth && npm install" "cd server/menu && npm install" "cd server/plan && npm install" "cd server/docs && npm install" "cd server/file && npm install" "cd server/notification && npm install"
scripts.start: concurrently --raw "npm run start-client" "npm run start-auth" "npm run start-menu" "npm run start-plan" "npm run start-file" "npm run start-notification"
scripts.start:stage: cross-env NODE_ENV=stage concurrently --raw -n CLIENT,AUTH,MENU,PLAN,DOCS,FILE,NOTIFICATION -c cyan,green,blue,yellow,magenta,red,white,gray,brightBlue,brightGreen,brightYellow,brightRed,brightMagenta "npm run start-client:stage" "npm run start-gateway:stage" "npm run start-auth:stage" "npm run start-menu:stage" "npm run start-plan:stage" "npm run start-docs:stage" "npm run start-file:stage" "npm run start-notification:stage"
